information: The company JUICE AND WORLD S.L., is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 2001, which operates in the Drinks industry. It also operates in the Drinks, soft, concentrated fruit juices, pasteurised fruit juices, and alcoholic beverages industries. It is based in Villatuerta, Navarra, Spain.
